name: http-appletv-bridge
description: A bridge server that can run on a Raspberry Pi.  It will connect to your Apple TV, and expose its power state via a simple HTTP interface.

scripts.start: npm run check-pyatv && npm run build & nodemon dist/http-appletv-bridge.js
scripts.check-pyatv: pip list | grep pyatv || npm run install-pyatv
